resources.string: This application is no longer supported and it\'s not recommended to use it.\nPlease use the button below to get \'Scripter\' instead.\nFor Israel related scripts please use menu option \'About\' in \'Scripter\'

Missing root permissions!
you must unlock your device in order to use this application (it changes system files)
